/opt/clion/clion-2021.1.3/bin/cmake/linux/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/cola/CLionProjects/simple_cpp
    -- src/Welcome.cpp will be compiled to bin/Welcome
    -- src/CMakeCXXCompilerId.cpp will be compiled to bin/CMakeCXXCompilerId
    -- src/main.cpp will be compiled to bin/main

-- Generating done
